title: Login fails intermittently
description: Users report being unable to log in randomly. The error message says 'Authentication failed' but credentials are correct. Happens more often during peak hours.

title: Button color is wrong
description: The submit button on the settings page is blue instead of green as per the design spec.

title: App crashes on startup
description: The application crashes immediately after launch on Windows 10. Error log shows null pointer exception in UserService.init().

title: Search results are slow
description: Search takes 10+ seconds to return results when there are more than 1000 items in the database.

title: Data export missing columns
description: When exporting to CSV, the 'created_at' and 'updated_at' columns are not included.
